author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Tile shower tips for plumbing…I’m using a diamond hole saw with an attachment for drills. The template guides the hole saw and retain water, which reduces chipping. I use Perfect Level Master crosses to get consistent grout joints, they’re available in 1/32, 1/16, and 1/8 inch sizes 🔥#tileshower #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Tile Shower Tips for Plumbing - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
